channel.title: Augsburg on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Augsburg on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.description: Good morning from Augsburg, Germany 👋🏼 Not many people around (expected for the second day of Easter), but we got a beatufil sunshine and a great view.
item.content: Good morning from Augsburg, Germany 👋🏼 Not many people around (expected for the second day of Easter), but we got a beatufil sunshine and a great view.
